name: Lucid Horrors
description: Lucid horror is a game where you are playing as a 12-year-old child who has been experiencing lucid dreaming. However, these lucid dreams are turning into a nightmare due to the fact of a mysterious figure called the dream snatcher who has been stealing all the kid's dream's and putting them into a deep dark forest. The dream snatcher is a tall, shadowy figure with a white mask who lives in the woods and sets up traps to stop the kids from ever coming back to their dreams.
